title: Enterprise â€“ UseMe Labs
description: Enterprise-grade deployment of UseMe Labs with integrations, SSO, governance and dedicated SLAs.

hero.headline: Lithuanian AI with enterprise guarantees
hero.subheadline: Integrations, SSO, governance and SLAs you can audit. Agents that never fine-tune on your data.

sections.heading: Plug UseMe Labs into your stack
sections.body: Connect Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, Atlassian, Slack, Teams, SharePoint, Salesforce and private APIs. Every call is logged and signed.
bullets: Private API proxies with IP allowlists and rate limits
SCIM user sync and Just-In-Time provisioning
Webhooks back to ERP, BI and event streams

sections.heading: Unified sign-on and granular access
sections.body: Support for SAML 2.0, OpenID Connect, Azure AD, Okta and Smart-ID verification. Agent permissions are separated from user privileges.
bullets: Step-up MFA for sensitive workflow approvals
Delegated partner access with full audit trail

sections.heading: Data remains in your chosen jurisdiction
sections.body: Models are never trained on your data. Deploy within your VPC, via Vercel or on-premise Kubernetes. All files are encrypted at rest and in transit.
bullets: Key management via HSM or Azure Key Vault
RAG source manager with version history

sections.heading: Control center and auditor-ready logs
sections.body: Admins see every agent step, accessed datasets, selected models and delivered answers. Define policy blocks that agents execute automatically.
bullets: Policy engine with conditional action blocks

sections.heading: Delivery timeline
sections.body: Week one: process and data discovery. Week two: agent orchestration and integrations. Week three: production pilot with enablement and success metrics.
